sentences.english: Ammonia gas released byfertilizefertilized cropland is a cause of air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 被施過肥的農田釋放的氨氣是空氣污染的原因之一。

sentences.english: This paper reported the results from industrial side-stream test of the new NT-13 low-temperature desulfurizing agent.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了低溫氨氣脫硫劑工業側流試驗情況。

sentences.english: The mechanism of sensitivity to ammonia has been explained.
sentences.chinese: 文章分析了器件對氨氣的敏感機理。

sentences.english: The ammonia comes from firedamp fermentation has been determined by ammonium - gas - sensitive electrodes with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出用氨氣敏電極快速測定沼氣發酵中氨的方法。

sentences.english: Ammonia gas released by fertilized cropland is a cause of air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 施過化肥的耕地釋放出的氨氣是空氣污染源之一。

sentences.english: They can also reduce the strong smell of ammonia gas.
sentences.chinese: 它們同樣還可以減少氨氣的刺激性氣味。

sentences.english: Trees can also reduce the strong odor of ammonia gas.
sentences.chinese: 樹木還可以減少氨氣的濃烈的氣味。

sentences.english: A method for the ammonia electrode determination of Kjeldahl nitrogen in water is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用氨氣敏電極測定環境水樣中凱氏氮的方法。

sentences.english: A spin disc insures that the ammonia and exhaust gases are perfectly mixed.
sentences.chinese: 轉球確保氨氣和排放氣體完美地混合。

sentences.english: The NH3 released from drying sludge was more than that from wet sludge.
sentences.chinese: 烘乾後的污泥比溼污泥釋放氨氣更多。

sentences.english: Ammonia gas released by fertilized cropland is a cause of air pollution , the .
sentences.chinese: 施肥後的農田釋放的氨氣是空氣污染的一個因素。
